title: Harrowing 2015? (riot pls respond)
body:
Yo,

I just wanted a minute to appreciate 2014's Harrowing event, it was honestly my favourite time of the year in terms of events (Christmas, Easter, etc...) thanks to League! 

So I was hoping I could get a word from a Rioter themselves if they have anything planned for Halloween this year :D . I've only been playing League for a year so I wasn't too sure for Riot to do something on Halloween every year. Thanks!

{{champion:120}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:30}} <3 <3

replies.body: They have harrowing every year and always re-release the harrowing skins for a certain amount of time before going out of stores till next harrowing.
